explains: v. 更新，革新；修复；重新布置（renovate 的过去式和过去分词）

sentences.en: While these buildings could be renovated at a fraction of the cost of rebuilding the Cathedral, planners are more likely to knock them down and rebuild.
sentences.cn: 虽然这些建筑的翻新成本仅为大教堂重建成本的一小部分，但规划者更有可能将其拆除并进行重建。

sentences.en: China's newly renovated Great Wall Station on King George Island makes the Russian and Chilean bases here seem outdated.
sentences.cn: 中国新翻修的乔治王岛上的长城站，让这里的俄罗斯和智利基地显得很过时。

sentences.en: When was the last time you renovated it?
sentences.cn: 你上一次更新网站是什么时候？
